metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2116 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Memory leak in the jas_iccprof_createfrombuf function in JasPer 1.900.1 andearlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) via a crafted ICC color profile in a JPEG 2000 image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jasper package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1').
